entities.name: dudley demented
entities.description: The event of Dudley being described as 'Demented' is mentioned in the text, but it's not clear what this refers to. It could be a nickname or a description of his behavior.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is described as snarling and yelling at Harry, indicating that he is in a state of anger. He is also mentioned as waving at Mrs. Number.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as struggling with Uncle Vernon and using his wand to defend himself. He is also mentioned as looking around after the loud cracking noise.

entities.name: mrs. number
entities.description: Mrs. Number is mentioned as being waved at by Uncle Vernon, indicating that she is a neighbor or acquaintance of the Dursleys.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon and Harry are in conflict, as evidenced by their struggle and Uncle Vernon's anger. This is described in the text as 'Put — it — away!' and 'Get — off — me!'.
Harry uses his wand to defend himself against Uncle Vernon's attack, indicating a defensive relationship between the two.
